Lancaster Colony Corporation 29
Social
Retention and Turnover
Historically, Lancaster Colony’s turnover rate has been below the external benchmark from the US Bureau of Labor Statistics: 
Manufacturing industry/non-durable. For FY20 , our annual turnover rate for our hourly team members was 21.9%  versus the 
external bench of 36.6% , outpacing the bench by 14.7% . This trend is traceable to FY19  when our turnover rate was 21.8%  
compared with the external bench of 38.6%  or 16.8%  better than the external bench. Our retention rates for employees 
who started and ended FY19 and FY20 with us were 82.85% and 82.27% , respectively. This performance is driven by our 
commitment to do better for our employees through programs and incentives designed to enhance benefits, pay, worker safety, 
and overall work-life balance.
